Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. description: Client (F/41) is living with her new husband and 2 daughters. Her younger daughter (F/15) is currently on Family Guidance Order and abides to a curfew. However, client is concerned about leaving her unsupervised at home when she resumes work as she brings home her friends daily. Due to their financial constraints, client has not been able to purchase a small CCTV camera as a safety precaution. A donation of a small CCTV camera will be greatly appreciated. Thank you. (Liyana)

name: Fresubin
description:
Client has terminal illness and short prognosis. Due to his medical condition, he is now on liquid diet and has to survive on 4 bottles of Fresubin nutritional drinks a day. 

Client is in financial need as he has been unemployed for several years and savings have been depleting. Family is not contributing to his medical related expenses. 

Client would benefit from kind donation of 124 bottles of Fresubin per month for 2 months, cappucino and vanilla flavour.

Kindly contact me at my work mobile at 84282545.

name: Adult Bicycle + 2x children bicycles with training wheels
description: Client is the sole breadwinner of her family, with 6 children, and is currently undergoing a divorce. She is front-line worker in a hospital, and has little time to spend with her children due to her job responsibilities. 4 of her children who are under 7 years old have voiced out that they want to learn cycling, and she would like to bring them out to learn cycling as a family bonding activity. She currently do not own any bicycles of her own, and hence would like to request for one adult bicycle of her own, and at least 2 children bicycle with training wheels for her children to share.
specifications: Adult Bicycle should fit a lady
